span.strong: Kudos to the YISD Print Shop!

br.br:
The Cedar Grove Elementary Community would like to thank the district print shop for their prompt service in making copies for our students to continue their at-home learning.
Cedar Grove ES Leadership Team
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Print shop

span.strong: Kudos to Parkland High School Wind Ensemble!

br.br:
Kudos to the Parkland High School Wind Ensemble for collaboraing via Zoom to give the community a special concert of "Amazing Grace!" Click here to view the video.
Ysleta ISD

a.title: Go to comments for Parkland band

span.strong: Kudos to Miguel Villalpando at Del Valle High School!

br.br:
I would like to recognize Miguel Villalpando From Del Valle High School for assisting our custodial team at Alicia R. Chacon International School during the sanitation of YISD Properties. Thank You Mr. Villalpando!
Anonymous
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Villalpando DVHS

span.strong: Kudos to Norma Sierra at Mesa Vista Elementary School!

br.br:
Thank you Mrs. Sierra (Principal) and Mesa Vista for making it quick and easy to pick up my grandkids laptops. It was nice to see you guys care so much! Hopefully my grandkids will see you again soon!
Garcia family.
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Sierra Mesa Vista

span.strong: Kudos to YISD Security Officers!

br.br:
I would like to commend all YISD Security Officers who have been vigilant and dedicated to the districts mission. Throughout the unprecedented events surrounding COVID-19, all officers have gone above and beyond to ensure that all campuses are secured and safe. As a result of your dedication and hard work for the district, it has had a profound and positive impact on the El Paso Community as a whole. Thank You for your devotion!
Christina Hernandez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Security

span.strong: Kudos to Robert Murillo and Raul Martinez at Vista Hills Elementary School!

br.br:
Thank you for cleaning and having our rooftop drains free from debris which aids and prevents accumulation of standing water that may cause classroom leaks when it rains. Thank you!
Frank Gonzalez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Murillo/Martinez Vista Hills

span.strong: Kudos toJohn Zamarripa and Josephina Menchaca at Del Valle Middle School!

br.br:
I would like to recognize Mr. Z, Mrs. Menchaca and all of the volunteers who helped at Del Valle Middle School during the Special Olympics Basketball Tournament. It was great way to bring together all of the wonderful athletes, coaches, refs and parents. I was amazed at how well everything was organized. I spoke to a ref that was so amazed with the athletes and said that he would gladly volunteer again! There were also many comments made about how beautiful DLVMS is!
Mrs. Marquez
View more Service Excellence Kudos

a.title: Go to comments for Sp Olympics Del Valle MS

p.span:
Kudos to Jose Najera fromCustodial Equipment Repair!
Kudos to Jose Najera for repairing our vacuum cleaners, buffing and scrubbing machines and ensuring Vista Hills has proper working equipment to maintain our hallways and school looking great! Thank you!
Frank Gonzalez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Najera Custodial

span.strong: Kudos toAdrienne Panell, Johnny Barron, Jimmy Woods, and Emmanuel Gallegos in Grounds!

br.br:
Kudos to the Grounds Personnel Adrienne Panell, Johnny Barron, Jimmy Woods, and Emmanuel Gallegos for always having our campus grounds clean, neat and attractive. Thank you!
Frank Gonzalez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Grounds

span.strong: Kudos to Mr. Charlie Garcia, Mrs. Lucero Miranda-Reid, the teachers, staff and students at the Center for Health Professions at Bel Air High School!

br.br:
Awesome job preparing for and presenting to the National Assessment Governing Board. Everyone shined and demonstrated true service and academic excellence!
Cecy De La O
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for BA Health Professions

span.strong: Kudos to Armida Gallegos from Northeast Transportation!

br.span: We would love to take this moment to congratulate Armida for her amazing job at dispatch. She is everywhere and always with a great attitude, from answering phones, always answering the radio even in rush hours, working long hours, excellent customer service, driving buses, and we just don't take her job for granted. We just want to say thank you for all you do.
Northeast Transportation Center

a.title: Go to comments for NE Transportation

span.strong: Kudos toCoach Rodriguez, Coach Dolz, Coach Rollins, Coach Cook from Hanks High School!

br.br:
Kudos to our Floorball coaches for volunteering their time and effort to our Unified Special Olympians who will be representing the United States in the 2021 Unified Special Olympics!
Richard Salcido
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for HHS floorball

span.strong: Kudos to Victor Lara and Laura Ponce at Del Valle High School!

br.br:
I would like to thank Mr. Lara and Ms. Ponce for taking the time to assist their students and the professionalism they show when working with our kids!
Chava Landeros
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Lara Ponce DVHS

span.strong: Kudos to the Bel Air High School Security Team!

br.br:
Kudos to our outstanding security team of officers at Bel Air. Officer Fulkerson, Officer Perez, and Officer Montoya are always lending a helping hand to maintain the integrity of well administered 9 weeks tests. Thank you Sgt. Orozco for your leadership on this incredible team. Go Red!
Alex Carrillo
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Bel Air HS Security

span.strong: Kudos to Assessment, Research, Evaluation and Accountability Dept.!

br.br:
I would like to thank the AREA testing team for always helping when needed. I can call 100 times a day and I still get their full attention and positive attitudes. They are awesome!
Stephanie Lahrman
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for AREA

span.strong: Kudos to Mary Grace Mascorro at TIS!

br.br:
Thank you Mary Grace for coming to the rescue! She provided service excellence today to BAHS attendance office when the system kept kicking us out. She went above and beyond and checked other areas that needed to be updated for our systems to run more efficiently. You are greatly appreciated!
Naomi Santacruz
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Mascorro TIS

span.strong: Kudos to Enrique Escobedo at Purchasing Department!

br.br:
Enrique is an amazing asset, not only to the Purchasing Department, but the The District as well! Enrique continuously displays patience, professionalism and courtesy when providing assistance to me. He simply goes above and beyond his scope of duties. He does not make me feel like just a "number." He inquires and asks questions to better understand the purpose of my requisition without just "rejecting" it. Thank you Enrique for your patience and professionalism. You are truly appreciated!
M. Contreras
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Escobedo Purchasing

span.strong: Kudos to Hugo Martinez at Career and Technical Education!

br.br:
Thank you and congratulations to Mr. Martinez for such a successful Elementary Robotics Competition. All competitions were so organized and FUN! Thank you for providing this experience to our children!
Yanira Borjon
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Martinez CTE

span.strong: Kudos to Stephanie Solis and Corina Valdez-Trujillo at Ysleta High School!

br.br:
Ysleta High School held their 3rd Annual Spirit of Dance Competition and it was awesome! The event was well organized, ran smooth, the whole show was entertaining! Ms. Solis and Ms. Valdez-Trujillo, along with all the dance, law enforcement & fire tech students did an outstanding job. Thank you all!
Veronica Ceballos
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Solis Valdez YHS

span.strong: Kudos to Monica Vasquez in Purchasing Dept.!

br.span:
Thank you Monica and Christine for assisting the HVAC department with our time sensitive needs. Your willingness to help and hard work does not go unnoticed. We truly appreciate you!
Michelle C. and Mario M.
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Vasquez Purchasing

span.strong: Kudos to Richard Gomez at Transportation!

br.br:
Mr. Richard Gomez provided service excellence to Central Office athletics during a motor coach trip to Arlington, TX in January. As stated by the sponsor, "Phenomenal driver, wonderful representative for YISD!. Awesome driver and person." Bravo Mr. Richard Gomez for a job well done!
Leo Benitez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Gomez Transportation

span.strong: Kudos to Raul Torres, Eastwood Robotics Volunteers and CTE Department!

br.br:
Congratulations to Mr. Torres, the Eastwood Robotics volunteers and the CTE department for hosting the Superintendent's Cup at Central office. The competition was very well organized and ran super smooth. Students loved competing under the show of lights! Thank you and great job everyone!
Miguel Gonzalez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Torres EHS

span.strong: Kudos to Norma Garcia at Indian Ridge Middle School!

br.br:
I have been to this campus several times in the morning and she is always there to greet the special needs kids at the door, always with a good morning and a smile. She knows all of their names and they all share her enthusiasm.
Mrs. Enriquez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Garcia IRMS

span.strong: Kudos to Sandra Hernandez at Glen Cove Elementary School!

br.br:
Thank you, Ms. Sandy, for your act of kindness after school on February 21. You obtained help for a student which was perceived as urgent. He was happy to see his task accomplished. Glen Cove staff has always been impressive. I first witnessed this in 1978 when my children attended this school. You are continuing the tradition.
Martha Rodriguez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Hernandez Glen Cove

span.strong: Kudos to Nico Cossio at Transportation!

br.br:
I brought in unit #17 for a mirror replacement and it was fixed in 30 minutes. At the same time, my exhaust system did not sound very good, so Mr. Nico told me to leave the bus. When I came back for my PM run, it was fixed. The bus sounds so good now and runs great. Thank you to the mechanics! You guys do a great job besides having to help in driving and other things to make our buses run. KUDOS!
Mr. B
View more Service Excellence Kudos

a.title: Go to comments for Cossio Transportation

span.strong: Kudos to Nellie Portillo at Hanks High School!

br.br:
I cannot thank Ms. Nellie Portillo enough for helping me get all of my department's needs (and the rest of the school) taken care of. She has guided me through the entire process and made my first year back at The Kingdom pleasant.
Daniel Martinez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Portillo HHS

span.strong: Kudos to Paul Covey, Laura Widner, and Maria McNulty from Valle Verde Early College HS!

br.br:
I am so grateful to the administrative team at Valle Verde Early College High School for their care and dedication, and for providing their utmost support for their students. They each have taken the time to personally contribute to my daughter's education by ensuring that she is valued and encouraged every step of the way. Their genuine interest in preparing her for her post secondary journey is something that is near and dear to my heart. The efforts from this group of individuals goes above and beyond the mere administrative functions as they have reflected a genuine care and concern for my child and all her Spartan peers. Thank you Mr. Covey, Ms. Widner, and Ms. McNulty for your dedication and love of my daughter Lennon Alexis Romo. Each of you truly represents the greatest of what Ysleta ISD has to offer. VVECHS was definitely the best choice. Thank you for all that you do.
Sandy Marie Romo
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Covey, etc VVECHS

span.strong: Kudos to Volunteers from Ascarate ES, Cedar Grove ES, Riverside HS, Thomas Manor ES & Ysleta Pre-K!

br.br:
Once a month Riverside HS services 500 plus families within the El Paso community with approximately 80 pounds of groceries donated by the El Pasoans Fighting Hunger Food Bank. This could not happen without the dedication and hard work from our feeder school volunteers. A huge kudos and many thank yous to Dana Ahedo (Ysleta Pre-K), Lupe Armendariz (Cedar Grove), Violeta Dominguez (Ascarate), Blanca Villanueva (Thomas Manor), Nurse Christy (RHS), Shirley Vasquez (RHS), and their volunteers. I am forever grateful for sharing your heart with our community.
Ana Holguin
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Hunger Bank

span.strong: Kudos to Andres Sermeno at Thomas Manor Elementary School!

br.br:
I want to thank Mr. Sermeno for his assistance on helping us with traffic, enabling us to exit out of the school, and making it possible for us to get students home and on time. We greatly appreciate his help. Thanks, that's team work.
Elsa Salmeron
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Sermeno Thomas Manor

span.strong: Kudos to Federal and State Program Department!

br.br:
Thank you for putting together such an awesome "Parental Engagement Conference" this past weekend. Our Dolphin Terrace Elementary parents, faculty and staff were very thankful for having variety of topics, information, courtesy booths, breakfast and lunch that were provided. The set up and transition was smooth and organized. Once again, The DISTRICT, at its BEST!
Lorraine Martinez
View more Service Excellence Kudos.

a.title: Go to comments for Federal pgm

span.strong: Kudos to Eva Villegas at Pebble Hills Elementary School!

br.br:
Our wonderful crossing guard, Eva Villegas, showed a tremendous act of kindness when early on a rainy and snowy school morning, Mrs. Villegas, carried a child across the intersection on Edgemere Blvd. so that our little Bobcat student would not wet her shoes. You are a Key of Kindness at THE HILLS and a true example of Service Excellence! Way to be a bright ray on sunshine on a rainy day, Mrs. Villegas!
Alex Corona

a.title: Go to comments for Villegas Pebble Hills

span.strong: Kudos to Larry Morrow in Transportation!

br.br:
Larry came in the morning and turned most buses on, as well as turning heaters on the day it snowed. You never have to be told to be there for one another in the northeast. It's just something that is natural. Thank you Larry. This helped a driver who needed a mechanic get there with plenty of time.
Berenice Chavez

span.strong: Kudos to Bel Air HS Academic Decathlon Team!

Kudos to the Bel Air Academic Decathlon team for leaving me a nice note of thanks while competing at Ysleta HS. They left my room in perfect order, and I greatly appreciated their nice note.
Justyne Tubbs

span.strong: Kudos to Isabel Valentin and Edward Whatley from Hanks High School!

Ms. Isabel Valentin and Mr. Edward Whatley are awesome Special Education staff that cares so much about their students. Ms. Valentin and Mr. Whatley don't let their students give up easily. Instead they challenge their students to believe in themselves. Hanks High School is blessed to have great staff like Ms. Valentin and Mr. Whatley.
Jennifer Esparza

Elisa Cumplido

Carmen & Diana
